Reviews.Title: I finally bought an iPad...
Reviews.Author: Mary Richardson
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Samsung Galaxy Android phone when it was first introduced and had it for nearly 1.5 years. I have never been one of those "Apple Fans" and I really wanted to like the Android operating system. But I quickly found the Android OS to be a lot of hype and empty promises. Updating the Android OS is a nightmare, takes many months for hardware companies to release it (if they chose to support it) and I had to wipe my device each time (losing everything). The battery life was over-promised from the beginning and only got worse over time. As the tablet computers took off and became more popular, I wanted to buy an Android tablet but the reviews indicated the battery life was over-promised on most devices and the newer versions of OS were slow to be released and supported. I was tired of the empty promises and just wanted a device to work all day long and upgrade without losing everything. So I decided to give Apple a chance when they introduced the "New iPad" although I hated the name.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Larry A. Sample
Reviews.Content: What needs to be said about an Apple anything.  Top knotch product with top knotch service in every way.  Even broke another iPad, told them it was our fault and Apple replaced it for free.

Reviews.Title: Fast and awesome
Reviews.Author: M. Mai
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad about 3 weeks and I love it.  A lot faster on the Internet than iPad 1 & 2 I guess the processor are faster and newer.  The screen is much, much better compare to iPad 1 & 2 side by side...retina display is crystal clear in HD.  The only cons I guess is the iPad itself is a little hot after a long period of use.  Other than that the iPad is really great

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: Apple is a known brand so I can say something different than most of the people know. Is is an excellent product. the only thing that is not so good or may be I didn't find the way how to do it is the camera which has a very low resolution

Reviews.Title: Love it (and I'm a hybrid user)
Reviews.Author: Throwdown
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure how much I'd like the iPad 3rd Generation as I am a devout Android phone user. Having said that I also own and use a MacBook Pro and iMac daily. Love how easy it is to use any app I load on this. Performance has been flawless and I don't regret not getting one that uses a phone carrier for data. If I don't have Wi-Fi available where I'm at, I simply fire up a Wi-Fi hotspot on my Samsung Galaxy S III and I'm good to go.Consider some type of flip case an essential accessory!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Simah
Reviews.Content: I would have appreciated that somewhere in the description, you would have stated that this iPad did not have the internal guts to be hooked up to a cell phone plan. Sine it was supposedly the latest and greatest I was surprised to get to Verizon only to find out I couldn't put it on my phone plan. You need to write script for those of us who are somewhat lacking in computer skills but are trying...

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: B. tyminski
Reviews.Content: very satisfied with the ipad. it is a little heavier than i realize it would be.I would certainly recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: I-pad
Reviews.Author: julie sigler
Reviews.Content: Love my I-pad. Don"t know why I waited so long to get one or how I lived without it. I use it everyday.

Reviews.Title: Changed my life
Reviews.Author: Roxanne
Reviews.Content: Although disappointed when I realized there was actually an Ipad 4, i kept the 3rd generation anyway. No complaints. Love it and use it throughout the day.

Reviews.Title: Light, and fast
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife and she loves it. Much faster startup than her old laptop. Great for email and web surfing

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: L. Deister
Reviews.Content: I love my ipad. Can't stand to be without it. The best thing since sliced bread. Entertaining and so much fun

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Robert Mann "History Guy"
Reviews.Content: Trouble Free.  Use a couple of hours a day...news, entertainment, etc.  Great when on the road.  I may buy another.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jacqui L.
Reviews.Content: Very good, responsive and everything works fine, Can't go wrong with Apple! I'm actually using it to write this review c:

Reviews.Title: Great I Pad - just as described
Reviews.Author: Emma
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my bf as a present. it was like brand new and even came with an ipad cover and a stylus (brand new in packaging) that I was not expecting. Great value for money, HIGHLY recommended :)

Reviews.Title: Apple is Apple
Reviews.Author: Len
Reviews.Content: Apple is always superior with these gadgets. Especially now that they are more affordable. What i didn't liked was the way it was packed to another box. There were no added security in it. Then top and bottom box was not taped...

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade from old version
Reviews.Author: Artie M
Reviews.Content: I've had every iPad that came out and this one is awesome. I had the iPad 3rd generation wifi only for a while and I was needing to use data on my train rides and decided to get a new iPad. Settling for a iPad LTE carrier was easy for me. I chose AT&T; because I already have the iPhone 5 under that carrier. The speed is amazing and I love it!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS!
Reviews.Author: Paul Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I'm still not totally sure what to do with this...but I love being able to pick it up and search for something that I just heard or seen.  My husband says it is a $500 Game Boy for me...and that is somewhat true...but am trying to use it for more useful things!  Still love it anyway!

Reviews.Title: Very useful and entertaining
Reviews.Author: good fun on my S3....
Reviews.Content: This iPad takes excellent pictures, makes excellent slideshows and editing (with additional software).. All around enjoyable and educational for the whole family.

Reviews.Title: ipad
Reviews.Author: baf
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife she loves it!Nice screen size,easy to use.Had it for over a month.,Good colors on screen.

Reviews.Title: As Expected.
Reviews.Author: dc
Reviews.Content: arrived in sealed box in new condition.  turned on and started using immediately.  performs as expected.  no surprises.  great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Apple wins again
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love that i can take my library with me,my bible study tools with me and fits easily into my purse.I wanted a bigger size than the mini and love it, the ease with which apple products work is amazing, compared to android. I will always choose apple over any other.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: This Item was stolen in Venezuelan airport of Maiquetia....so I could't have my beautiful iPad in my hands. I am very sad for this.

Reviews.Title: Its very good.
Reviews.Author: CHARLES KOTZER
Reviews.Content: Hello. Everything arrived fine. I would like to know about the warranty. I live in Venezuela, and the ipad work with 3g  any carrier. Which is fine

Reviews.Title: iPad 3
Reviews.Author: chris fiordeliso
Reviews.Content: What do I need to say. Anyone who has one knows!  Beware this product can become addicting. Before you know you'll be buying one for the whole family.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPAD
Reviews.Author: Evelyn J. Russell
Reviews.Content: Excellent product!  It was a gift formy husband and he can't keep hishands off it...smileArrived on time and in excellent condition!

Reviews.Title: No es lo que esperaba...
Reviews.Author: Luis Eduardo Farias Rosas
Reviews.Content: Y me refiero a que en ningún lugar de la publicación dice que el iPad es refurbished. Debería exigirse al vendedor publicar esa condición.

Reviews.Title: C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc
Reviews.Author: Jacek Grundland
Reviews.Content: Propably the retina iPad has better WiFi but my wife old samsung galaxy 10.1 has much better WiFi than ipad 3. That is disappointig.

Reviews.Title: Just exactly what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Jerry M. Clemons "Cutigers"
Reviews.Content: Works well as expected for Apple Products.I find it difficult to close open apps.Maybe my fingers are to big or I just don,t know how to touch the little icons.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Becks
Reviews.Content: Got this for a friend and she loves it so much. Thank you very much, I am a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Product arrived on time
Reviews.Author: Claudia Monteith "CMonteith"
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time and is working perfectly. I love it and would recommend this IPAD 3 to anyone who wants to purchase the best tablet

Reviews.Title: Great job
Reviews.Author: Jamel Hill
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product for everyone. The product arrived at the said date and is of the greatest quality. All pieces came together.

Reviews.Title: tardaron
Reviews.Author: elio
Reviews.Content: el producto tardo en llegar, esa es mi única acotación mas nada del resto el producto llego en buenas condiciones.

Reviews.Title: Instruction Manual Required
Reviews.Author: NIGEL E HARGREAVES
Reviews.Content: So many features and shortcuts still to discover. Siri can't cope with my "English" accent! Asides from that, very good.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: I am on my second IPad 3. Both units have WiFi  defects. Cannot maintain WiFi connection, even though multiple IPhones, Ipad, laptops at home are all connecting fine. Endless hours spent troubleshooting with Apple Support unsuccessful. Have tried everything recommended. They have no idea how to repair. Went online to find countless other customers experiencing the same defects. Apple Support not addressing it an obvious software or hardware defect. Expensive device (expensive junk)  - should work without  troubleshooting every time I want to use it. VERY DISAPPOINTED.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Brittany D. Herndon
Reviews.Content: I use this more than my laptop, there are so many apps I use this iPad for almost anything.  I don't have any cons, just pros. I'm glad I finally bought one.

Reviews.Title: I like it...but
Reviews.Author: william v gullickson
Reviews.Content: I am not sure what I was expecting. It seems to be more or less just a large iphone. This not necesssarily bad, I just thought there was more. Perhaps there is, lets give it time.

Reviews.Title: A+
Reviews.Author: Johanna
Reviews.Content: Everthing went well! Great product as described. Will do business again. Awesome company to do business with. The product was exactly what we wanted. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: John B. Goode "JBG"
Reviews.Content: Pros:Quick start up, easy to navigate and use. To put it in one word, convenience. We use it for multiple tasks, but mostly for browsing, communications, watching videos and some games. Basically laptop light. The major pro to me is the quick start up.Cons:Small screen, sometimes I find the words hard to read and the zoom function is not as good as on my laptop. Does not support some non-Apple programs. Not useful for word processing or heavier duty functions. It's basically laptop light (which is both a pro and con).I think of it as a super remote control that I can carry around the house, taking the place of the simpler functions of my laptop.

Reviews.Title: Poor wi fi performance and customer service
Reviews.Author: A. Wertheim "werthla"
Reviews.Content: My IPAD 3 wi fi constantly slows down or loses connectivity after fifteen minutes in public wi fi spots. It does well at home.  In hotspots it's unusable.  I went twice to the apple store and a genius did a reset of wi fi networks, went out to test, no better, returned and requested an exchange as its still under warranty. The manager said their "process"requires a total system reset first.  So they reset it and I had to leave.  Still no good.Contrast this with customer service with Verizon where I had a defective earphone jack on a droid phone.  They took my word for it, shipped a new phone out immediately and a container to return the old phone.  You bet I will stay with them.My next tablet will be an Android.  Apple no longer has a monopoly on tablets which seems to elude them.A also have a Kindle Fire HD which is great.  I will have to make a third trip to the Apple store which is not convenient.After my third trip to the Apple store, they honored the warranty and gave me a new and working iPad 3.  I must say, the apps for the iPad work very well  give it an edge for now.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: grace
Reviews.Content: This was a great gift. It has many awesome things you can do. The IPad is very cool and fun.

Reviews.Title: Obsessed!!
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: Product was EXACTLY what I wanted.  Shipped quickly.  I spend everyday on this tablet.  Never opening my laptop again LOL

Reviews.Title: Inpecable Experience
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Martinez
Reviews.Content: Is everything it is advertised for. It was a gift for my daughter and she is very happy with it. I am thinking of getting one for myself  but probably will wait to see what will have to offer the new 5th generation.The delivery service was inpecable so overall, it was a great experience. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad for my wife for Christmas.  It came in perfect condition and works great. We all take turns using it on the wireless network and have had no problems at all.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad MD328LL/A (16 GB Wi-Fi White) 3rd Generation .
Reviews.Author: Bob & Evelyn Horacek
Reviews.Content: Bought the ipad for my wife . She really likes it . She says it is everything she expected . She is on it all the time . She tells everyone about it .

Reviews.Title: My 1st. I Pad
Reviews.Author: WVsunnydays
Reviews.Content: I really didn't know what I would use this jewel for.  Pretty user friendly and getting more familiar with it daily.  I mean you get no instructions with this thing except a web based users guide that I stumbled across.  I can watch Netflix on it now.  Needs a pretty good Wi-Fi signal though or else it looses contact with the web.  Would I pay this much again.  I doubt it.

Reviews.Title: I Pad Ratings:
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife and I now have my I Pad back, LOL. She really liking her own Pad and learning yet. The photos are awsome, Even Photos sent to her via I Phones are great quality. She is thinking she would of like to have the G3 over wi-fi so if you were to go on trip then apply for the G3 service only during those times.

Reviews.Title: Love the iPad
Reviews.Author: Erin L. Kirkpatrick
Reviews.Content: There is nothing really different between the 3 and the 4 so I thought I would save some money and get the 3.  It works and looks great.

Reviews.Title: I pad, 4G
Reviews.Author: James Poitras
Reviews.Content: Fantastic, love it.  Amazing unit, compact, fast.  Would defintily reccommend to others.  This one was a gift.  Can not wait to have one of my own..........Thanks JP

Reviews.Title: Exceed expectations
Reviews.Author: Belen Reyes
Reviews.Content: I Love my Ipad, you guys deliver on time the product. I will recomend my friends about your company. Exceeded esxpectations.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: Very good product.  The camera button takes more than one touch to work.  Also I notice the lower left corner is slow to work.  I may not have the right touch but I noticed everything else works on the first touch.  Thank you,

Reviews.Title: The best Christmas present ever.
Reviews.Author: spielberglover
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas this year. I love it. It's just like a computer except with an easy touch screen. I hope everyone had wonderful holidays. In fact I am typing this review on my ipad 4. This baby has a redesigned retina display. I'm not sure why apple is not selling the ipad 3 anymore. Could you guys leave me a comment explaining this please? Anyway this would be a great device to get your child or teenager for x-mas or any time of the year really. The only thing that makes a gripe is the price. It is still worth it though. This device is also great for school, playing fun games through apps, and for work and job related business. Even if you want to have a little fun whether on car rides or long distance air flights. You'll love the ipad 4. MERRY CHRISTMAS AND HAPPY HOLIDAYS. Most have already pasted though. P.S.: Before I forget, HAPPY NEW YEAR! I accidentally made a mistake! SORRY! I clicked on the 3rd generation ipad instead of the 4ourth. They look the same though.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: pcas
Reviews.Content: it was everthing all rigth :) :) :) :) :):) :) :)  :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :)

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Tommy Brumfield
Reviews.Content: One of the greatest gift I every gave my wife, she loves very much.  She has enjoyed her I-Pad greatly

Reviews.Title: iPad 3rd generation
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful Christmas gift!!! Plenty of memory for my pics!There are more features and less than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Joined at hip with my iPad
Reviews.Author: Susan Rausch
Reviews.Content: This is one of my best purchases in the past five years.  I love to play Draw Something & other word on it - my husband poker.  Versatile!

Reviews.Title: This is a great product
Reviews.Author: Edward E. Pittenger "One of many students"
Reviews.Content: There are very many apps for the IPAD that you will not see for other tablets.  Battery is long lasting between charges.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: beijia zhang
Reviews.Content: Almost new ipad for an used ipad price! I am rating using it now :) very happy with my new toy!

Reviews.Title: IPAD new generation
Reviews.Author: Ronaldo
Reviews.Content: IPAD was in great condition, no issues. There was even a extra included! Highly recommend purchases online service and price are great!Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Wifi version doesn't have true GPS
Reviews.Author: Brother Mark "Brother"
Reviews.Content: One thing I didn't realize when I bought my wifi only version Ipad... it doesn't have true gps functionality.  It uses ip address based location services when you are connected to a wifi signal.  The cellular version includes a gps reciever that functions even if you don't sign up for cellular service.If you download maps in advance, your cellular version ipad can trace your route on the map and function as a super handy 10" screen Garmin.  The wifi version won't be able to locate you on a map away from the wifi signal.If I knew all this when I purchased my wifi version Ipad, I would definitely have bought the cellular model just for the gps feature.  Apple doesn't make this very clear on it's website, but it's in the technical specs.

Reviews.Title: Hands down one of my best purchases
Reviews.Author: Bryan W Lewis
Reviews.Content: I only use it for studying purposes and occasional netflix/amazon/hulu/youtube watching but it has almost become something that I cannot leave the house without. The only thing I regret is not purchasing one with more memory, I basically have no room on the built in hardrive for music or many videos, because I have placed all my photos on there.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Landau
Reviews.Content: The display is incredible. Seems faster than previous versions. I strongly recommend this article to anyone Who has not tried it yet

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: cricket
Reviews.Content: Best thing I have purchased so far I use it every day I use it for everything and take it everywhere oh did I say I love it well I Love it

Reviews.Title: Without any doubts, mac products always be the best
Reviews.Author: Shawn Para "Shawn Para"
Reviews.Content: iPad 3 32G is more valuable than ipad 4. Although new pad has retina, 32G is also worth a 5 star

Reviews.Title: The best portable gaming device!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: When you download games on the Ipad 3 and start playing, the games have a very good resolution and all of the games are HD.  The applications are different on the Ipad 3 than the laptop or any personal computer.  It is easy to understand and use most of the different games.  The more difficult games to use are: Minecraft and Gravity Guy.  The games that require internet include: MetalStorm, DragonVale, and Battle Bears Royale.  Some good games that don't require internet include: Shufflepack, Fruit Ninja, Temple Run, Urban Crime, and Crash Drive.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 3 = FTW
Reviews.Author: Tillman H. Smoot
Reviews.Content: While the battery is a bit slow to charge, as long as you turn off location services and push notifications, this is a fantastic ipad. I had the original Ipad and this one is leaps light years ahead of it. Speed, image quality, everything about this Ipad, with the exception of the cost is fantastic.If you're thinking about a tablet, Ipad is really the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Kewl
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: I got it for her for Christmas. Bought it in october. She Hasn't put it down since before halloween. Itold her it still counts as a Christmas gift.

Reviews.Title: Its an apple product... Of coarse its a five star... And I am a PC guy
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I have an $8000 PC but I love apple products.  They don't release a product or feature until it works RIGHT.  You will have great resale value and great customer support.  The battery last a long time and the screen is fantastic.  Hurry up apple.  Make a retina display that I can use on my PC :)

Reviews.Title: Apple still has a leg up...
Reviews.Author: RBrandon "Grimm147"
Reviews.Content: I will never, ever use an iPhone. Android has got me with their million customizations and options when it comes to mobile phones. However, when it comes to tablets, they still have a long way to go.The iPad simply is designed to teach anyone who picks it up should be able to figure out how to use it. That is great for most of the population, and for me most days. Having a program (iTunes) that allows for being able to connect to the computer can also make a big difference when you want to quickly add movies/tv shows/ Outlook data.The closed eco system that is Apple can be annoying, especially when I can customize my phone far more then my tablet, but until Android begins to unify a bit more in their tablets, I will stay with the iPad.

Reviews.Title: I Pad
Reviews.Author: Noel
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with this purchase.  It came as expected and I was a little leary about ordering something like this on line, but it was perfect.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Debigonz
Reviews.Content: It does its job and keeps me in touch with different networks. It is a Mac so of course there are many things not compatible with PC software. Other than that it's fine

Reviews.Title: Pad up
Reviews.Author: DelKar "DelKar"
Reviews.Content: All my reviews have been submitted from my iPad ... Not a big deal or need to boast .... At least I don't have to slug around my laptop or be confined to my PC desk. Apps are kool... Capacity is necessary for the pad... Plants vs Zombies is addicting! Get my morning news delivered to iBook so no wet paper! Still so much more!

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: PatWise "PatWise"
Reviews.Content: I had a Toshiba Thrive for over a year and really liked it but kind of wanting something else. I never thought I'd own a IPad in my lifetime because of cost. I did buy the 3rd generation 64 g and really happy with it so far. It doesn't come with much on it so I had to download what I wanted extra. Gave my Thrive to my daughter and we are both very happy.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: cam
Reviews.Content: I am using it now. It arrived quickly, still trying to figure it out. The quality is great. I have a lot to learn. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted
Reviews.Author: Cory L Enderby
Reviews.Content: It's awesome!  It is everything I expected and more.  That's everything I have to say about that.Not sure why I have a minimum word limit :)

Reviews.Title: iPad is easy
Reviews.Author: Richard Stout
Reviews.Content: My iPad is easy to use, easy to recharge, and easy to synch with my iMac.  I just remember that it and my iPod are the 'children of my iMac.  My photos, music, and podcasts are now available in several formats.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Barbara "Barbara"
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 20 y/o daughter as a birthday/Christmas gift.  She absolutely loves it and wouldn't change a thing about it.  Extremely simple to order and delivered with no problems at all!

Reviews.Title: iPad review
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: My purchase of the new iPad 3rd generation  from amazon was perfect and exactly as the description said. It works great and I love it. I haven't had any issues with it and when i received it, it was flawless and brand new and i was extremely happy about that. If you're looking to buy an iPad choose amazon to purchase it from. I was fully satisfied with my purchase of the new iPad from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: E. Smart
Reviews.Content: I bought this item fairly used. Seller said it was less than two weeks old. Item came just as described, and on time!I've been using it since, with no problems at all. I've compared the cost and I believe I made a wise decision.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Conklin
Reviews.Content: Well I finally gave in to all the hipe about the ipad.  I LOVE it.  it is wonderful.  I am sorry I didn't buy one sooner.

Reviews.Title: lenadormanator
Reviews.Author: Lena Dorman
Reviews.Content: I have an ipad and it is great, I hope you love it! Cause i do:) because it is like the best electronic tablet out there

Reviews.Title: Love my new ipad
Reviews.Author: Caren Parnes
Reviews.Content: Got this device used about 6 months old. The unit was flawless and I didn't expect to get so addicted to it so quickly! Only thing I sort of regret is having gone with the 32 GB rather than the 64 (which I have with my iphone), since I have a lot of video and music on it and ran out of space pretty quickly.The ipad 3 is gorgeous for video with the new retina display and it is a perfect text reader (I personally like it much better than the Kindle). It's a bit heavy and largish for my purse, but I wouldn't go smaller with the mini since I think it is an idea size for both video and reading.Love it!

Reviews.Title: As Expected
Reviews.Author: cbear10
Reviews.Content: Everything showed up as described and almost two weeks early. It works perfectly and it was the best gift I could've given. I greatly recommend this user and would defintely use them again.

Reviews.Title: Great experience
Reviews.Author: Kranker
Reviews.Content: Thought the product may show wear and tear, but looked brand new.  Product worked as it should and I would use this vendor again.

Reviews.Title: iPAD is still the mark to beat
Reviews.Author: S. Kalm "no more help"
Reviews.Content: I compared so many other tablets before purchasing this. There is no comparison out there in terms of quality, screen, and performance. It makes travel so much nicer.

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Joseph  P. Saline
Reviews.Content: Ipad is great, however it didn't come with a simm card. I bought it for my son,now I have to get myself one.

Reviews.Title: Had to return one of three, not sure of others yet
Reviews.Author: Gardening Girl "Bonnie"
Reviews.Content: Ordered three iPads, not getting any reduction in price, but needed them quickly and no Apple stores nearby. One was entirely broken, had to be returned. Returned it and replaced it with one from  the Apple store and got a lot of extra service by doing so. Would not purchase again from Amazon if an Apple store is nearby. Love the iPads. Combined with the Logitech Ultrathin keyboard it replaces a laptop for a low tech user. He reads library books, the newspaper, follows weather and the financial markets, emails and is a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product AND Amazon Rocks! .
Reviews.Author: Frank Jamison
Reviews.Content: Received the IPAD quickly and in excellent condition (Amazon provides great service).  Outstanding product, the new Retina display is absolutely awesome!  After a few days I noticed that Apple was releasing a new model IPAD, one with a faster processor, better camera, etc.  I returned my IPAD to Amazon with no problems or delay in getting my credit card reimbursed since I was well within the Amazon return period.  Amazon rocks!  They provide unequaled service to the customer - great products, quick deliveries, reasonable prices and an outstanding return policy.  Whenever I want to buy anything, Amazon is the first place I visit and, almost all the time, where I buy my item(s).

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I am very happy and pleased with my purchase. It was actually a gift for someone and the are very pleased with the product. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 3
Reviews.Author: pcreddy
Reviews.Content: I liked it because it is working as I expected. I feel very happy to work on this Apple iPad 3.

Reviews.Title: My son loves it!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for school. His class is reading Romeo and Juliet and it makes it easier on the school if they don't have to supply every student with a book. He has 5 other books that he will be reading and he already has the list so he can read ahead and not get behind. Thank You So Much!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: toter13
Reviews.Content: i apsoluteley love the iPad 3 or the new iPad it has a much better screen and some people say they can't se the difference i can and the new camera is great  i love everything apple

Reviews.Title: Excelent gift.
Reviews.Author: G. Vidrine
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a college graduation gift and she loves it. I was also given one for work to review and work toward utilizing tablets in replacement of laptops where applicable. I was skeptical but have become a fan of the I Pad.

Reviews.Title: Love My iPad
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: The product itself is great of course! I loved , loved, loved the ordering process and the promptness of my product arrival!

Reviews.Title: Excellent reselution
Reviews.Author: ahmed_elschenawy
Reviews.Content: this ipad have the excellent resolution yet :). The speed on games is really good also you can capture good picture using this ipad

Reviews.Title: Happy with my new gadget
Reviews.Author: May T.
Reviews.Content: The new iPad is a wonderful addition to my gadget family, and this means a lot to a gadget geek like me!

Reviews.Title: Thank you, Apple!
Reviews.Author: R.T.
Reviews.Content: Oh, wow, i just love my new iPad, the pictures are so bright and the quality is just amazing! Thank you, Apple!

Reviews.Title: My First Tablet - a hdtv in your hand
Reviews.Author: SP
Reviews.Content: I was almost considering the iPad2 for portability but ended up getting  an 11inch macbook air last year.  Yet with all the convenience a tablet has over a  laptop  I've been waiting for this retina screen and pre ordered  my first tablet a Black 16Gb 4G At&t; on the first day of release. Glad to have skipped the earlier 2 Gen's of iPad.With just few hours  of usage, I realized how convenient it is for everyday browsing and entertainment.  Retina screen really made a huge difference.  It truly appears like an hdtv in your hand. Definitely recommend buying it. For some reasons I've always  tried to stay away from  Apple products due to their higher  price etc.,  But over years, I find myself  accumulating Apple products  starting with my first purchase a 3rd gen Nano to  this current iPad 3.  I feel their products  are really designed for convenience, there is so much attention given to minor  things that other brands do not care about.  This factor alone makes me forget about their price.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, horrible sellers.
Reviews.Author: Kevin "USA"
Reviews.Content: I won't go ahead and give this tablet a 1 star rating because of all the no-life sellers selling this for way above retail even when there's tons here In the Tampa Bay area so I'm sure there are many everywhere else.Pros:The screen, I cannot stretch this enough, this should be a selling point right when you pick one up, it is INSANE how sharp it looks, plus all apps have been updated to accept this new native resolution on the retina display.The 5 MP camera creates a great depth of fielt but obviously not as great as you'd see on a DSLR ;) It's as good as it gets mobile wise. Personally, I will not be using the iPad to take pictures as I laugh at people who use their tablets to take pictures, they look ridiculous.Good feel and size - I'm one of the rare few that likes their items to have a good weight to them because it proves that they have value to them, like pick up a Walmart watch then a Michael Kors watch and you'll know what I'm talking aboutDictation - It's nice and accurate, old technology, nothing to see here folks.Elegant looks - Of course it looks breathtaking compared to any tablet out there, it is sleek and simple.Cons:Still no smaller model, this is not a personal concern but yeah for all the whiners out thereStill no headphones - is it that hard to include them apple? Come on...A5X processor - You would think being a 1gb dual core with quad core graphics processor that it would blow the A5 out of the water? It actually got a point lower than the iPad 2 ( 720 vs 721) disappointing.To sum it up really, if you have an iPad 2, do not upgrade, if you have the original PLEASE do. If this is your first Apple tablet or first tablet at all, buy it. I say this because it is simple and straight forward, other tablets try to be so unique that they make everything a buggy mess and lag so much.

Reviews.Title: Not Verizon ready
Reviews.Author: Michael R Cardillo
Reviews.Content: Just bought the Verizon ready version of thie iPad 3 after 2 1/2 hours on the phon with Verizon the product is no eligible for Verizon service.  I have to wait 3 days for Verizon to get my IPad resgestered and into their system.  Unbelivable what a waste of my time and to think I have to start all over again wait in cue with Verizon to try and get service to this iPad after I wait the 3 days to get this resgestered.  Why wasn't this already done for the price of $799 I shouldn't have to be doing this and there is no gaur entree this is going to solve my problemiPad

Reviews.Title: Fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Of course the NEW IPAD is everything the IPAD 2 is and better but I'm very dissapointed with the Fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating Apple claims it has, the finger smudges are as visible and annoying as they were in the IPAD 2.Also Apple failed to inform that they had changed the polarity in the IPAD so not all covers in the market ( from third parties) activate the cover lock/unlock option in the settings menu.I bought a non -apple cover with my new IPAD and found it didn't work the lock/unlock option, when I tried the apple cover it did work. My freind used my cover on the IPAD 2 and it worked fine, it just didn't work on the NEW IPAD.So be careful when buying a cover that is not from Apple.

Reviews.Title: Light weight and compact.
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Light weight and compact. Saves time by not having to take lap top everywhere I need to go.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good to have for Kindle, "webbing" and emailing
Reviews.Author: Jim Schmidt "Jimmbbo"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Apple product, so it's been a voyage of adventure...PROSBuild quality and ergonomics are first rate - a truly high quality product.The Retina display screen is exceptionally sharp and clear when compared to a friend's "iPad 2".Relatively crash proof and simple to operate (once the "operations code" is broken)Choice of applications is truly mindbending, likely the best feature of the unitSeamless updating and syncing with iTunesCONSApple's thought processes and symbology are different from PC developers, so there has been a learning curve for moi...  I can move around and activate any feature on any Windows PC without a hitch...  Apple has its own way of doing business...iPad "multitasking" is brain dead compared to Windows machines, and the inability to use Flash based websites due to the Apple/Adobe feud is asinine.  Fortunately, an app named iSwifter allows Flash based content to play on the iPad, so all is not totally lost, but iSwifter is not particularly user friendly.Recharging time seems to be long, compared to an ASUS netbook and a pair of HP laptops I haveAm unable to charge the iPad via the PC-to-iPad USBHaving problems updating apps via the iPad... have to update on my PC, then sync with the iPad...  minor annoyanceHas a proprietary power/docking connector, but converter cables to HDMI or USB are available.I enjoy using the iPad for webbing and email access nearly anywhere, plus the apps that figuratively and literally make the iPad sing.  Not new to an Apple-phile, but is really great for a newbie.Overall, am glad I purchased the iPad, and look forward to learning more about how it runs best...6 MONTH UPDATE - Upgraded from 4 to 5 stars. Am more comfortable using the Apple operating system and the logic they use to drive the machine... The problem with uploading apps disappeared with an OS update, now works seamlessly.  Using it most for Kindle reader or accessing email without having to boot my laptop or desktop PC.  Glad I purchased it....

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: When I recieved it; it was in brand new condition. The fuctions work properly and I havnt encountered any problems with it thus far.

Reviews.Title: Swiss Army Knife PC
Reviews.Author: WABit
Reviews.Content: I have had a computer around the house since a 5 baud (Byte/sec) modem was state of-the-art.  As an IT person I was never fond of Apple because it insisted on doing things just enough differently to create a lot of duplicate work with a decided decrease in productivity, however pretty it might be.  I bought the iPad to replace a Think Pad that had become a bit too big, pricey and complicated as a mobile personal computing device for a retired person with limited requirements.  The iPad continues the Apple tradition of providing a way to adequately accomplish a great number of tasks from a finely turned piece of hardware without the learning curve of a Windows PC.The iPad cruises the internet with ease.  My bank's mobile app for the iPad is easier to use than the PC version.  Word processing with "i"Pages is adequate and documents can be loaded into Word when necessary. Graphics insertion is well supported as is dictation without additional hardware or software. I can't find the iPad equivalent of Excel's Visual Basic for Applications in "i"numbers, but a lot of number crunching is available before macros become necessary. "i"numbers has 250 functions as compared to Excels 350 the last time I counted a few years ago.Music is supported quite well, but an iPad isn't the ideal walking audio companion.  iCloud, Apple software, which is provided free can keep your iPad synced with other Apple devices such as an iPod as well as your Windows PC.  There have been some nice surprises like a GPS helped by an app to use cell tower locations to help get a quick fix using what appears to be Google Maps.  Photo support is great and the onboard cameras have good resolution.  However, the iPad is an awkward camera and Photoshop Elements better at managing the family photos. On the other hand it's great for bragging on the grandchildren and transferring photos to the iPad isn't difficult.The on-screen keyboard has a learning curve and a Bluetooth keyboard is probably required if the iPad is to be your mobile PC.  If printing is necessity, you will probably want a printer that supports Apple's AirPrint technology.  HP and other manufacturers newer printers support AirPrint and the iPad can wirelessly print to them.  I tried a couple of apps that claimed to allow iPad printing, but the results were disappointing.  I purchased the AT&T; cellular data option and find it works a little slower than WiFi on 3G, but not enough to be a problem.My iPad is an adequate replacement for my laptop, a fun toy but I don't plan to give up my PC for the foreseeable future.  I don't often give a 5-star rating and the iPad has some bugs and limitations, but it does a great job at what it does - an Apple tradition.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: bettyd999 "bettyd999"
Reviews.Content: I received my IPAD about a month ago.  I can't say enough about how wonderful it is.  I just love it.  I only got the WIFI since I will only use it at home.  It's everything that I expected and more....

Reviews.Title: Nancy's IPad
Reviews.Author: Nancy E Volpe
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my iPad immensely but I have only learned the basics.  ,I need to go back to the book I bought and resume reading from page 45.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 3rd generation
Reviews.Author: NSGSTU
Reviews.Content: Great item, came sooner than expected and in brand new cond.; would do business with again.  IPAD was very reasonably priced, better than competitors

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Shelley
Reviews.Content: I went from the first edition iPad to this 3rd generation version.  Love it.  The camera is great (just sometimes wish it had a flash) and as always, the graphics are perfect.On a side note, the Notability app rocks!  (Full time student here.)  However, I had hoped I was going to be able to get some textbooks as ebooks on this device, but apparently iPad won't support any textbooks?  :(  Oh well, it's still great for note-taking and quick research.

Reviews.Title: A little heavier than expected
Reviews.Author: bookladyckb
Reviews.Content: excellence in visual-clarity; portable; but I now wish I had paid for the model with internet capacity. Besides that, No regrets re: purchase

Reviews.Title: as advertised
Reviews.Author: Crashtank
Reviews.Content: Works great and is everything that was promised. suprised at how long the battery lasts....take the time to look at the instructional video's and learn all of the movements and options if you are not an Apple person.

Reviews.Title: as expected
Reviews.Author: Anne Bothmann
Reviews.Content: Can't really add much to the already known facts.  Am enjoying reading my free books: Adventures of Tom Sawyer, Adventures of Huck. Finn, and now of Sherlock Holmes.as per Gutenberg press.  Am finding more apps to make it even more useful.

Reviews.Title: Coolest toy for a College Student!
Reviews.Author: Ken W. "No lie!"
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad 3 for my wife's Mauritian nephew who is visiting us in Georgia but living and going to engineering school in France. Flip out is an understatement! He stayed up all night figuring it out! He loves, loves, loves this thing! It is the coolest gift imaginable you can give a foreign college student. And relatively speaking much cheaper for Americans too! I just wish America could lure him to stay here. He's a smart kid!

Reviews.Title: non tech wife loves it
Reviews.Author: CoastRange
Reviews.Content: My nontechnical non gadget wife got this as a surprise 40th birthday present. She loves it completely! The only issue she has with it is the lack of rock solid apps that allow complete use and function creating and modifying MS Office documents. Other than that she is smitten.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!! I'm buying a second one for my wife
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: This a Great product, the retina display is simple great, much more stable because of the memory and the graphics in games are much better. The battery size is perfect for it.

Reviews.Title: My new IPad
Reviews.Author: Zsa Zsu Pitts
Reviews.Content: Wow! That was fast!It works, it really works! I'm amazed at how intuitive it is. I'm what is politely (impolitely) known as an old codger, yet after having it for 2 hours I'm sailing through it and thinking of more and more things I can do with it. Grocery lists, to do lists, books I want to read, appointments,take it on trips to check out hotels, restaurants, things to see; check the weather, road conditions, have email with me at all times...Before I ordered it I borrowed "iPad the missing manual" by J D Biersdorfer from the public library - great help.So far I'm very very happy with my purchase and grinning from ear to ear.

Reviews.Title: Ask my Wife
Reviews.Author: William Liles
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife. She loves it. I am a BigMac user, but becoming familiar with the IPad3.Great product, all that is advertised

Reviews.Title: New IPAD 3  from Quality Photo
Reviews.Author: C. Cocozza
Reviews.Content: I purchased the new Ipad 3 from Quality Photo and very happy with the purchase.  The product is sealed, brand new in the box as described. The shipping is super fast.  I ordered Friday and received it on the following Thursday.  Highly recommended seller.  As far as the IPAD itself, this is my very first Apple product. I'm a Windows person so I'm still learning the MAC interface.  I don't have any heating problem with new ipad.  The Ipad came already charged so I just used it until it's 20% low then I recharging it with no issue.  I purchased ZAGGFOLIO keyboard for my new IPAD and it's fitted perfectly.  Overall, very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice improvement in resolution!
Reviews.Author: Sherif Mageed
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad for my cousin and got to use it for a week. It's a nice unit but I don't think I'd spend this price on a Pad. I bought the White iPad 3 wiFi and 32Gb.PROS:1.Smooth operating system and quicker than the previous version.2.Resolution on screen and on cameras are much smoother and defined.3.Battery Life is greatCONS: (gave a 4 star rating for points listed below)1.Would like to have an expansion slot for more memory and maybe even a USB connection for my external drive2.High Dollar tag for something that pretty much does what all the other iPads and tabs do (My Asus- TF300 is $200 Cheaper) and still provides all the things that anyone else would use a pad for3.Heavier than my ASUS Transformer 3004.Love my Droid and the vast applications that are free or has minimal charge to purchase

Reviews.Title: Great New Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Rod
Reviews.Content: This is the second iPad at home. I received the iPad1 two years ago as a gift that I turned to my wife. When the iPad came into the market I thought it was just a bigger iPod touch, but it is much more than that. Its display allows to be used as a game pad for kids or adults, a great news paper reader, e-book reader, photo frame, instant internet browser and as I have done, reading personal and corporate e-mail. Its vast application store gives you access to thousand of free applications.Early adopters of iPad has the benefit of downloading free applications (or 99c apps) that later required purchased or a price increment, but as an early adopter those apps can be downloaded to you new iPad without requiring to purchase them again.Unless not all applications has been upgraded to the new retina display, it is noticeable when you open your photo library or the background photo. In some cases those not upgraded applications seems worst because the HD display make bad pictures to seem worse (similar to watching a SD program on an HD TV).The drawback that I have noticed on both iPhone 4S and newiPad (I have not tested the iPad1) is that when I connect them to my car AUX input they both does not seem to give enough power volume, so it requires to turn car stereo volume to it's maximum, so a lot of noise is then perceived. I do compare with an classic iPod and a Blackberry that perform much better on this circumstances.I have purchased a magnet case, but I have turned off the turn on on open since there are a lot of miss fires due an small movement. There should be a setting to turn it on by opening and touching the screen or something to prevent miss fire.One thing that I miss on iPad is the ability to take pictures even it is blocked (as the iPhone 4S) also to mute music when it is locked.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Ipad!!
Reviews.Author: Diego Galindo
Reviews.Content: My son is very happy with his new Ipad, we was dreaming with this device for two years at least, this Ipad will help him in his university studies

Reviews.Title: Excellent iPad
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I am totally pleased with this product. It is even more than I hoped for. I take it anywhere I go because it is so lightweight and convenient. Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: My first iPad
Reviews.Author: Erin McGinnis "science nerd"
Reviews.Content: I have owned iPhones for a few years now, and this is my first iPad. I love it! My only complaint is the typing-- iPhones and I guess iPads too don't like my fingers too much but I may purchase an external keyboard soon.  It is fast, has Siri (with the newest software update), excellent voice recognition, excellent camera, etc. I have been playing around with the included photo booth and the iPad3 is by far my newest and most fun toy!

Reviews.Title: Good iPad, touchy headphones jack...
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: I recently got an iPad 3 wifi and I've liked it except for the headphones jack.  I am having a weird problem with my Echo headphones in that it works on everything, iPad 3G, computers (windows and mac), and everything else except the iPad. I went to Apple and it turns out that it's a specific iPad wifi model problem but they won't do anything since it is only my pair of headphones! But they work on everything else! It's so stupid that the 3G models have an upgraded headphone jack that will work with ANY headphones, including mine.  I might have bought that model if I knew that! Now i have to get another pair of headphones just for the iPad, which is ridiculous! Still a good tablet though!

Reviews.Title: I like
Reviews.Author: reviewman
Reviews.Content: Coming from the tightest man to make a review I would recommend. These are awesome. I love rambling on and getting automatic grammar corrections. I have mad love for apple and the status they represent.  Are there cheap competitors acceptable? Probably but they don't represent one of the best names in computers ! Mine is hacked by scum with email advertisement fronts. Take a professionals advise and don't over paid for such an insecure load of crap.

Reviews.Title: NEW IPAD
Reviews.Author: pal_1704
Reviews.Content: Just AMAZING!!!It is like an extension of my arm!Great experience with the resolution of the screen, HD movies look awsome.

Reviews.Title: Great Upgrade, but not quite as expected.
Reviews.Author: Ron A "Ron Alden"
Reviews.Content: The new iPad is very nice, but it really isn't that great of an upgrade compared to the iPad 2. The screen is really nice and sure you get a better camera with a faster processor, but there isn't enough content yet to justify spending the money on the new iPad. The content that isn't Retina Display enabled tend to look bad when compared to Retina Display enabled content. It's great, but I would wait for the next one.

Reviews.Title: Product is fine until you have a problem.
Reviews.Author: Ariella
Reviews.Content: The product is difficult to trouble shoot and customer service is not impressive.  I have a bad ipad and no one can help me get it fixed by trouble shooting the device.  You need to jump through hurdles and they do not think twice about asking you to delete your contacts, calender, etc.  If there is not a better way to troubleshoot, the product is not worth it.  Go with a different tablet- will be less expensive and you may get better support.

Reviews.Title: Please read this if you think of buying:
Reviews.Author: Chess Parent
Reviews.Content: Ok, I would like to start by saying that the iPad that my wife got for me has no functional deficits. The reason I am assigning a "1 star" rating to this product is NOT because we bought a defective unit. Nor am I disappointed with the service: every time I went to the Apple Store to get help (and that happened a lot!), a perky 16-year-old would materialize out of thin air and show me how to press the only button available to make the gizmo work.But herein is the rub: if buying an iPad, any iPad, please be aware of its limitations. I THOUGHT I WAS GETTING A SMALL COMPUTER, WHAT I GOT WAS A LARGE CELL PHONE WITHOUT THE PHONE!PROs:-- it looks cool;-- my kids love it;-- yes, there are a lot of free apps in the AppStore;-- you can check your eMail pretty much anywhere and any timeCONs:-- many "free" iPad apps are "teasers;" i.e. they have limited functions and you have to pay to get a full version of these apps only to discover that they are often faulty;-- NO Java support-- NO Flash media support (although the iPad does come with a free YouTube app)-- NO preloaded apps that would let you manage Word-type documents or Excell-type spread sheets (you have to buy those but, again, once you do, you soon realize that they are nowhere close to the quality of the ones you use on your desktop [Mac or Windows])-- most importantly, there is NO ABILITY TO MANAGE YOUR OWN FILES! This one particular lacking feature drives me to distraction! There are several apps you can BUY that would allow you to manage your OWN files but, again, they are very poorly designed and often do not interact well with iTunes, Windows, or, surprisingly, iPad's own OS system .-- and here is another critical issue: EVERYTHING MUST BE SYNC'd via iTunes. If you are running a Windows desktop, this may be (and in my case indeed IS) a serious problem. Things purchased via iTunes, iStore, AppStore, etc, usually manage to get to your iPad unscathed. Other content (e.g. I am an eBook fan and purchase my eBooks in multiple places on the Net) are not so fortunate. Although, Apple's iBook app is free and allows you to use both .pdf and .ePub formats (you can also install a free Kindle app for .mobi books),  actually getting your books onto your iPad may be difficult, if not impossible. You cannot "drag-and-drop" your book files (or any other files) onto your iPad. Everything MUST BE SYNC'd with iTunes, an app called "DropBox," or some other app. If your iTunes does not get along with your desktop (usually a PROBLEM FOR WINDOWS users like me),  you will end up spending endless grim nights uninstalling iTunes, re-installing iTunes, wiping your iPad clean, sync'ing and re-sync'ing your iPad again, and again, and again.-- The Camera is OK, but keep in mind that all your videos will be in .mov format and may not play on all desktops --you will need a special converter to re-code the formats for non-Apple media players; you will need to install "Quick Time for Windows" on your desktop if you are running Windows.-- finally, there is noway to increase the amount of memory for the device as there is NO slot for a memory expansion card. I can't believe it! Every tablet has it BUT iPad. So you are pretty much stuck with 16 gB, 32 gB, or 64 gB tablet without ever having any hope of expanding!OVERALL :  I feel so bad that my wife spent all that money, time, and effort to get me this. I feel awful that her loving good intentions made us spend ~ $900 for something that turned out to be just an appallingly expensive toy, poorly engineered, thoughtlessly designed, and very frustrating to use. (The MSRP is ~ $600 - 700, but there are sales tax, additional warranty, front cover, back cover, USB attachments, and other apparel that one needs for this thing, hence the enormous price!)  The good thing is: it is possible to easily re-set it back to factory settings. And we still have the original box. I think it will make a great (and a VERY EXPENSIVE) Christmas gift for my in-laws. For Windows users (like me): please, think hard before sinking all that money into this purchase! Again, keep in mind, this is NOT a small and portable computer, IT IS ESSENTIALLY A SmartPhone WITHOUT THE PHONE!... just a bit bigger, though...

Reviews.Title: Not a notebook or desktop
Reviews.Author: Michael H. Kaplan
Reviews.Content: Pros: excellent color. Lighter than a desktop or notebook.Cons: Cannot print except to limited number of printers (no lasers). Does not support Adobe Flash - forget most videos. Software different than regular computer. i.e. on Amazon less choices when checking out and less info about products. Touching screen does not always work and ofter works when you do not want it to.  Mouse is more accurate and less mistakes. Still better than Kindle Fire but more expensive.

Reviews.Title: From an original iPad 1 owner.
Reviews.Author: Mafalda Quinn
Reviews.Content: I had the original iPad, but when the iPad2 came out, the "improvements" we're not enough to justify the change. I am so glad I held for the 3rd gen. This really is a change. Great cameras that take very good pictures  and videos. But to travel, I got the Samsung Galaxy 8.9". Awesome travelling tablet, and the pad stays at home.

Reviews.Title: Just awesome for the capabilities
Reviews.Author: rpv
Reviews.Content: For someone who is familiar with iOS and used either iPhone or iPad, the experience on this can be just great. If you have nothing to compare against, it depends. If you are coming from Android world, there may be some surprises.I got 64GB 4G LTE version. LTE version mainly for GPS as WiFiversion does not have GPS. I am big into using voice guided navigation. First let me go through areas which can be improved or what I find as negatives. Everyone gives positives which I will surely give in plenty at the end.1. Having no back button, I do find a bit troubling initially, but got used to quickly. I used iPhone, went back to android and now used a iPad. You have to exit each app in entirety before you can go and launch another. But if you back to original app, and if it supports multitasking, you can continue from where you left off.2. All tablets are heavy and one has to set expectations for one handed usage. This is compared to Kindle. So set your expectations3. Having no siri is a bummer, I thought Apple will have that. Hope a software update will fix it and they upgrade the data center machines to handle it.4. Voice dictation has lot to improve. Google voice dictation and decipher is unbeatable5. In App store after you buy each app, it jumps to new app. I often want to buy several apps at a time. Apps cannot be launched immediately, it takes time, so having ability download and trigger multiple app purchases in one screen will be good. For example a car racing game I downloaded was 1.3 GB!6. I wish you can pack more apps in each page like the bottom bar which can have 6 apps.7. iPad does not have an app/hardware to do laser dental floss for you :)Now the Positives. The positives outnumber the negatives by a huge margin.1. The display is very sharp. Since I have not used any tablet in the past for prolonged periods, there is no reference for me, but looks sharp. I have used Archos couple of years back.2. Having 64GB was a boon as I have GBs of music, photos and pdf documents. pdf documents render beautifully in this ipad. text is sharp and crisp.3. Navigon, mow owned by Garmin is fantastic. It is like having a large map with you. The details and voice guided directions are excellent.4. Settings menu is just great, I played around with all options in settings. Accessibility options are great. Being able to increase font sizes is excellent. Black on white and white on black are also great.5. The apps are very fluid and apps like Kindle is excellent6. Touch response is just awesome. No android phone can even come close to it. I used Archos android tablet in past and iPad is so smooth  ---> major point7. Overall OS/sandboxing mode is very secure. I trust iPad and iOS far more than Android though I am a fan of open source software. Chances of malware/virus are slimmer than in other non iOS phones/smartphones. ---> major point8. Integrated hardware/OS makes everything looks beautiful9. Diagnostics menu in settings lets you look into code dumps and crash reports. It gives you a sneak peak to how things work inside if you are not a iOS developer10. Smartcover design is genius11. Kids just get it. My 3rd grade daughter started using without even thinking it as a computer. I realized what ubiquitous computing meant. It just comes naturally to kids who have no fear and want to get their work done whether to make cakes using cake doodle, play ping pong, paint the screen or read books/take pictures/modify the photos. They for a second don't think it is a computer, It should do everything.12. I have not tried 4G yet. I will use while travelling only but will use GPS frequently13. Camera is awesome in this iPad. You see pictures in big clear screen. If you print you may print in 4x6, so your print is smaller than what you see, just the reverse of norm. iPhoto is terrific.14. Video quality looks great for shooting indoors. I don't think I will shoot outdoors in a beach with this.15. Having SD card adapter/camera connector is a big plus for me.16. I won't go into the basics, browsing/email/notepad/ etc. There is nothing more for me to say about them. You will reinvent browsing with this device.17. I will keep adding some apps I keep using on this - Notetaker HD, tweetbot, pogoplug, navigon, kindle (retina support), flipboard, dictionary, iPhoto, google, Amazon, lastpass, iTunes U (great app), Onenote, Zite, Google earth, ABC Player, Google currents, Solarwalk.Current trend for me seem to be  start day with smartphone, day with laptops, nights/weekends on iPads!

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet Ever
Reviews.Author: Joe Rose
Reviews.Content: APPLE RULES.  The New iPad is the best thing i have bought in awhile I highly recommend it to everyone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: fun, but like a china doll
Reviews.Author: Ryan Smith
Reviews.Content: Let me preface this with the fact that I have been an apple user for decades, but am considering other options. Over the last few years, I have thought about moving on. For example, my new MacBook's battery died within two years (new ones cost about $175!) This iPad was great, but the digitizer (glass) broke and it is extremely fragile. It can cost about $250-$500 to fix (you can get one or two tables for the price of the repair alone). By contrast, Amazon has always replaced my items either for free or at a reduced cost. My first Kindle reader broke due to wear and tear, and they gave me a new one at a reduced price. When the new one broke, they replaced it for free (Apple will never do this unless you pay for apple care, which is more akin to gambling than to customer service). I have had two HP computers through work, and they seemed much more sturdy and the battery lasted longer than my MacBook; and were definitely more reliable than my iPad (which with a cracked screen is basically useless).In terms of fun and the number of apps, the iPad may be better. But in terms of sturdiness, product quality, and the ability to replace when broken, I think the Kindle fire would definitely be a better purchase. For the amount I have spent on the iPad and all of the issues associated with it, I could have had about three fires. It seems like I can get everything in Apple that I can in Amazon (syncing, personal cloud, etc.), except that Amazon is less in terms of dollars, and has better customer service and stands behind their products a lot better. Sorry Apple, but my heart may be moving on to Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Araya Thomas "Mauricio"
Reviews.Content: The new iPad has a gorgeous screen with a superb resolution I don't use my laptop anymore for browsing purposes, the ease of use and the smoothness of the UI is unbeatable, I purchased an incipio NGP back protector and is great. Apple is the most valuable company in history for a reason.

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad market, not a tablet market.
Reviews.Author: J. J. Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Excellent device and simple to use.I've owned many Android tablets and none of them have been a great experience, at least not as good as the experience of using an iPad.The iPad is simply the top dog. It's smooth, simple, and elegant. The craftsmanship excels as expected from Apple.Sure, it can be pricey. But it's worth it. You will get what you pay for with an Apple product.

Reviews.Title: thank's
Reviews.Author: JQL "JQL"
Reviews.Content: wooow!! all i can say is the best and the fastest ever.i love it.very good condition.i will recommend it to all the amazon buyer. .AAAAA++++ seller.great seller.great product.clean.hope to buy soon another one.

Reviews.Title: Wish I never bought it
Reviews.Author: Michael C. Walker
Reviews.Content: The iPad is a really cool device... when it works, and if you are a dedicated MAC person. If you are not, your experience is likely to be incredibly frustrating.  First of all, having spent an enormous amount of money, not getting a manual is unbelievable. But wait, that's why they want to charge you $99 for a year's worth of customer service, or a smaller sum just to answer a single question!!!  The original I bought didn't work and I had to return it.  Thank God at least the brief warranty was still effective.  I had always heard MACs were reliable and PCs weren't.  Wrong!!!  I have used MACs before and never understood the buzz.  The iPad is neat, but it is buggy as hell and I have problems with it every few months.  My PC is quite old and needs to be replaced, I am not even tempted to buy an Apple product, they remind me of old Jaguar XKE's look great, but spend way too much time in the shop!

Reviews.Title: Still not up to par
Reviews.Author: Andrew Koroluk
Reviews.Content: The new screen is great. It is vibrant and has such high resolution. Also, the processor is much better. Apart from that, I am very disappointed with the Ipad 3. I have programmed ~700 of these things for my job at a local high school. The UX is sub-par. The touch-screen doesn't work well at all. There's my two cents.

Reviews.Title: WiFi issues
Reviews.Author: Uncle Ruddy
Reviews.Content: Had my iPad 3 for probably 6 months, having bought the first and second generation ones previously.  The WiFi got slower and slower.  Had Verizon out to my home for 1/2 a day - they checked everything.  Ipad worked fine for another month then WiFi slowed to a crawl.  My wife's Ipad 2 continues to have no WiFi problems. This appears to be a problem with iOS6 - it is well documented at the large company I work for.  No more Apple products for me.

Reviews.Title: A thousand miles ahead of Kindle Fire - It's not even close.
Reviews.Author: Jose P. Costa
Reviews.Content: ** Edit to this review - I have no clue why this iPad is $559 here when it's $499 everywhere else - Buyers beware! **I came looking for an iPad on Amazon and they re-directed me to a Kindle Fire vs iPad chart.  I bought in to their marketing and picked up the Fire instead of the iPad 2.What they fail to mention is that the Fire is NOT a Tablet, but an eReader with a few Tablet like functions - I couldn't easily edit documents, let alone create new ones, the User Interface was very laggy and buggy and I only have access to 5GB of storage and not 8GB as advertised and I had a much smaller selection of apps than even my 1st generation iPod Touch.I've since picked up the new 3rd generation iPad and the Kindle Fire is a toy compared to it - I can do just about everything - Even visit flash-based sites via Photon browser, and the selection of creative apps, including Word, Excel and Powerpoint compatibility is AMAZING. The iPad is 95% of what a laptop is and does things not other device can do right now.My new iPad is even a Kindle AND a Nook! - I can buy books from all 3 major eBooks publishers and the iPad's much more powerful CPU lets me breeze through huge PDF files.There's a reason why Amazon doesn't list the iPad on their Top 100 list - They know the iPad is a better device.  Yes, it costs more, but there's a reason for that!  If you want a good eReader get a Kindle Touch, if you want a real Tablet and King of the all buy the new iPad!

Reviews.Title: Best
Reviews.Author: shadford
Reviews.Content: I honestly don't know what I would do without my iPad.  I'm generally a Droid person when it comes to phones, but the ease and functionality of the iPad makes me want to switch to an iPhone as well.best Apps?  the HBO Go, the Beatmaker, and the Moog synthesizer.  Absolutely unreal.

Reviews.Title: Great at first, then you find out
Reviews.Author: C. Bristol "Crusty Lobster"
Reviews.Content: The Ipad is a solid stable platform that at first appears to be easy to use.  Then the extra charges for almost any app.  Then the fact that Apple can retroactively rescind your apps if Apple finds them unworthy, after you have paid, no refund. I would not go Ipad.

Reviews.Title: didn't work properly
Reviews.Author: Carol J Groberg
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed it didn't work. First item that hasn't work at all. It seems to have invalid serial number.

Reviews.Title: The iPad get a crack on the screen by itself
Reviews.Author: Xinyi
Reviews.Content: The iPad get a crack without any damage or broken, I just use it less than a mouth and with a case to protect it. I do not think its my fault.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed.....
Reviews.Author: Deimos "."
Reviews.Content: For the price I wanted more than a 10" Iphone.....there is no USB support, no file swapping, and you cannot hook anything else up to it unless Apple deems it ok via Itunes.....what a useless product.  If you have an Iphone 1/2/3/4/4s/5/5s, Ipod, Ipad 1/2/3/4/5/6/7/nano you have already have an Ipad.  The boring limited IOS is the same across all systems adding zero new functionality.  I was going to buy one of these until I looked at the Iphone I used to use (until I scrapped it for a Nokia Lumia 800) next to one of these IPAD's, laughed out loud and waited for the Microsoft Surface tablet/PC which is actually a fully functional tablet/laptop hybrid PC that doesn't need Itunes and a seperate PC to do simple tasks or transfer anything.  What a joke this is and I bet the same people who bought this will run out and buy an Ipad mini then the Ipad nano (4") Ipad Rofl.

Reviews.Title: BEST EVER.
Reviews.Author: Pierce
Reviews.Content: My ipad is coming today, i havent used it yet. but last christmas i thought that a nook tablet was a cheaper version of this, HELL NO. I used to friends ipad 2, 10,000x more apps. Nook and kindle fire dont even have a camera... most of the apps cost money and are a rip off... :/

Reviews.Title: Solid performer compared to all Tablets
Reviews.Author: Sunmaid12
Reviews.Content: After owning the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 which died after 8 days, I went back to buying the latest iPad and haven't looked back.  The problem with Android OS is the instability (constant crashing) and poor battery life.  Apple knows what keeps users satisfied by not trying to throw every possible piece of crap technology known to mankind.  They keep what works and only implement what makes sense.

Reviews.Title: My first iPad
Reviews.Author: Nadar
Reviews.Content: I kept myself away from 1st and the 2nd gen iPad for past 3 years. I thought having a windows tablet would make lot of sense to me. But after 3 years still there are no windows tablet and windows 8 is planed to be released by end of 2012. And there will be host of tablet makers good/bad/ugly onces in the market and trying to find the best one is difficult. So that means another 1.5 years of wait.Meanwhile, about 8 months back I purchased asus transformer 1st gen. It kept me happy for sometime, but latter I was less than happy with its performance. With the death of asus transformer tablet that I own, it was no brainer to buy the 3rd gen iPad.The iPad does what it is advertised to do, it is a giant iPod touch, but the larger screen is always better.The tablet is all nice and good, the apps, the performance the acceleration, the retina display etc.BUT the display calibration is bad. I have iPhone 4 and now iPad 3. iPhone 4 has much better color reproduction quality than iPad. The white on iPad looks pale white instead of pleasant white on iPhone.If the display is not able to reproduce the white properly then there is no way (IMO) it will be able to reproduce other colors properly.I have attached an image showing the difference between iPhone 4 and iPad3 display.EDIT1: I am doing a battery cycle test, i.e. charge to the maximum, discharge till it shuts off. Then recharge back to 100%. It took about 6-7 hrs to discharge the battery completely mostly reading books and surfing and few 1-2 min youtube video.And it is taken me 6 hrs to charge from 20% to 85%, I did not track when I put it charge at 0% so it has actually taken much longer to come to 85%. It is not a good deal with the batter, right? The battery discharges way faster than recharging. I am using the adapter and cable provided by the iPad 3. The battery recharging capability is less than satisfactory to me.Edit2: I upped my rating by one star because I am more than happy with the performance of the device.  How fast I can type compared to the android device I had and many apps that are polished for good experience.

Reviews.Title: Forced to drink Apple Koolaid
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I could not believe that Apple was censored and shut down until i received my ipad as was forced to join the apple club to do anything.  you could not use the system at all without being forced to give apple personal information.  just like something out of an Orwell novel.  i will do android stuff from now on where i am not pushed into things against my will.

Reviews.Title: Sticking by my word. These are overpriced toys
Reviews.Author: TEXAS ROCKS!
Reviews.Content: First no support for Flash. This is a huge problem. How can you not support this? Is it being fazed out, yes, but not for a long time. The lack of Flash hurts a lot of the websites I have tried to go to.Next, their new maps support. These maps are terrible. Why kick the company to the curb that has already done all the work, put all the money needed into it, and is proven itself. Why? Apple has gotten a big head again, and believes that whatever it makes it just has to be better.Touch sensitivity: I used my friends iPad 2 for awhile after he upgraded to the iPad 3. He told me I had to try the new version. The touch sensitivity seems to be off. It does not have the response of the iPad 2, Samsung Tab, or even a Kindle I used to have.Retina display failure: I see no difference between the iPad 2 and the new iPad. If you are looking at upgrading to the new one for its display don't. There is nothing special about it. It is just a numbers game.Must use iTunes: iTunes is one of the main reasons I will never own an Apple product. This software is awful. I cannot believe they have not made it easier to use. If you want to buy all your stuff through apple then yes, oh yes they make it easier. But what if you are not brain wasted by apple and you want to use Amazon to get your music for a better price? Not so easy to get it on the iPad. The software is a joke.No support for other video formats. This device unlike all its competitors has said no to supporting standardized formats. If you are buying this device and wanting to transfer your current videos to it, don't. It will only support the apple format.Your apple ID: This is nearly the worst part of the iPad itself. You cannot do anything on the iPad without this ID. It is terrible, and if you forget your security questions you will need a crack team that can get into Fort Knox to get back in. Why are these questions so important? Well it took me over a month to help my mother fully get back into her apple ID because if you upgrade to a new apple product and you do not know those questions? Good Luck! You may never get back in. And if you have spent a lot of money in iTunes it could be lost. BEWARE: write down your security questions.So much for ease of use. I have had in the past year family come up saying with a big smile I just got the iPad. I tell them good luck with that. They go off and "play" with it for awhile. Then they come back and ask how to you download apps, how do you transfer music, how can you put DVD's I already own on it, how can I view this website it says flash not installed, and the list goes on. It took only about a month for one family member to ask me what is this good for then?I then smiled.I stand by my word. It is an overpriced toy.
